revision.text: averaging objective A mean calculation which has averaging objective is a descriptive statistics calculation in which the mean is calculated by taking the sum of all of the observations in a data set divided by the total number of observations. It gives a measure of the 'center of gravity' for the data set. It is also known as the first moment. An averaging objective is a data transformation objective where the aim is to perform mean calculations on the input of the data transformation. Un objectif de moyennage est une objectif de transformation de données où le but est de réaliser des calculs de moyenne sur les données d'entrée. Elisabetta Manduchi James Malone Jean-Marc Meunier PERSON: Elisabetta Manduchi is a subclass from Objectif de transformation des données
